Description: Mould-made pottery lamp. Egyptian ring-handle. Discus decorated with Helios in a quadriga. Angular shoulder; row of impressed circles on upper angle. Kite-shaped nozzle. Base defined by a circular groove, KEP|ΔNN (sic) impressed.
Curator's comments: See ‘Enciclopedia dell’Arte Antica Classica e Orientale Supplement’ I, 1970, p.422; 'American Journal of Archaeology' LXXXVI, 1982, p.70, note 42.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (2076)
Walters 1914 / Catalogue of Greek and Roman Lamps in the British Museum (1052)
Sahin, Schwertheim & Wagner 1978 / Studien zur Religion und Kultur Kleinasiens : Festschrift für Friedrich Karl Dörner zum 65. Geburtstag am 28. Februar 1976 (p.242, fig.2)
Cahn-Klaiber 1977 / Die antiken Tonlampen der Archäologischen Instituts der Universität Tübingen (p.286)
Hellmann 1985 / Bibliothèque Nationale, Lampes Antiques I, Collection Froehner (p.46, 47)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
